snippet: Jeremy Lin scored 38 points, his best game since joining the Rockets, but Tony Parker had a triple-double to lead the Spurs to an overtime victory over Houston on Monday.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Houston Rockets, 134-126, in overtime; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin scored 38 points, his best game since joining the Rockets, but Tony Parker had a triple-double to lead the Spurs to an overtime victory over Houston on Monday.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin Has 38 in Rockets’ Loss to the Spurs
headline.main: Lin Has 38 in Rockets’ Loss to the Spurs
